attributes.action: Actually listen to the previous petition about Camden market and not just state rules and regulations for the gvt to intervene in planning permission.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When people first found out about the proposal to turn Camden Market into some awful shopping mall, they came on here and signed a petition against it, asking for government help. This has been ignored, with the government saying that the secretary of state can't intervene if permission has already been granted. Sign this petition to get the government to change it's policy to help save this important piece of culture!!!
